body_html:
Setting OMP_NUM_THREADS does indeed solve the performance gap for the single process benchmark.
We are still trying to make use of these variables in order to match the @761d679 performance for programs using multiprocess and doing most work on CPU. We are still experiencing ~2x slowdowns in those cases even when setting OMP_NUM_THREADS.
body_text:
Setting OMP_NUM_THREADS does indeed solve the performance gap for the single process benchmark.
We are still trying to make use of these variables in order to match the @761d679 performance for programs using multiprocess and doing most work on CPU. We are still experiencing ~2x slowdowns in those cases even when setting OMP_NUM_THREADS.
body:
Setting `OMP_NUM_THREADS` does indeed solve the performance gap for the single process benchmark.
We are still trying to make use of these variables in order to match the @761d679 performance for programs using multiprocess and doing most work on CPU. We are still experiencing ~2x slowdowns in those cases even when setting `OMP_NUM_THREADS`.
